tool_description: A Restful API which is scraping the Wikipedia pages for fish species in order to collect data. The data are cached and refreshed every 24 hours.
name: Fish species
title: Fish species

api_list.name: /fish_api/group
api_list.description: This endpoint will group the available data by the property_value parameter. The available URL query parameters are meta_property, meta_property_attribute, and property_value. The API will group and return all fishes that are matching the property_value that is given in the meta-object.

required_parameters.name: property_value
required_parameters.description: The value of property that will be matched

optional_parameters.name: meta_property_attribute
optional_parameters.description: The value of property that will be matched

api_list.name: /fish_api/fishes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all available fishes that are available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fish-species.p.rapidapi.com/fish_api/fishes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fish-species.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fish-species.p.rapidapi.com/fish_api/fishes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fish-species.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /fish_api/fish/{name}
api_list.description: This endpoint will return information for a specific fish
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fish-species.p.rapidapi.com/fish_api/fish/Tarpon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fish-species.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fish-species.p.rapidapi.com/fish_api/fish/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fish-species.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
